item.description: @avishaiw I think we‚Äôre about due for a sci-fi/action/Chanukah special.
item.source:markdown: @avishaiw I think we‚Äôre about due for a sci-fi/action/Chanukah special.

item.description:
@joshtpm But: Weren‚Äôt those boxes material that the Archives was expecting? In other words, documents that had already been cataloged? Which means these would be specific documents known by name and not by content?

@joshtpm Which is to say, not plans for stealth fighters, but documents generated in the course of ordinary business (and automatically named) but not yet archived?

@joshtpm If that is the case ‚Äî and I could well be misremembering the facts of the Archives reporting ‚Äî documents from 1/6 would fit the bill.

@joshtpm Could possibly be the sort of memo or emailed order to the National Guard that used to be called ‚Äúa smoking gun‚Äù back in the day.

@joshtpm Could well be more prosaic, of course. But something to consider before rising to attack the warranted seizure of documents
@emptywheel Sad to believe he‚Äôs the heir of a publication which once published Hannah Arendt.
item.source:markdown: @emptywheel Sad to believe he‚Äôs the heir of a publication which once published Hannah Arendt.

item.description:
@JamesFallows So if you had been assigned to write the post-FBI raid speech/social media post, what world you have said?

@JamesFallows Desperately trying to imagine the scenario where the FBI executes a search warrant on Carter‚Äôs safe in Plains.

@JamesFallows Presumably it‚Äôs a lead safe, where the former president has stashed some Kryptonite stolen from NASA, because he‚Äôs worried by what Superman might do under Reagan‚Äôs control‚Ä¶. https://t.co/ay5dEylyfg
@trekonomics And FBI confirms. https://t.co/DzKkFyrg5a
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics And FBI confirms. https://t.co/DzKkFyrg5a

item.description:
@alangblake @joshtpm First, reported income over 500k doesn‚Äôt include the people earning 500k but reporting 200k ‚Äî committing $100k fraud. Each year. So well more than $150k for a multi year audit.

@alangblake @joshtpm Second,are you against all law enforcement, or only those who might catch rich people?
item.source:markdown:
@alangblake @joshtpm First, reported income over 500k doesn‚Äôt include the people earning 500k but reporting 200k ‚Äî committing $100k fraud. Each year. So well more than $150k for a multi year audit.
@alangblake @joshtpm Second,are you against all law enforcement, or only those who might catch rich people?
